messages.message: You too, Brian! Let me know if I can ever be of help.
Went to a galvanize meetup last night. Excellent job with the venue and speaker so thank you for donating!
Oh Nice! Were you at our new Phoenix campus? I haven't been there yet. How's the facility? What meetup did you attend?

The building they are in is really nice. The office is modern and fresh. Lots of natural lighting, something a lot of offices lack. The meetup was an introduction to Docker. Phoenix has perfect whether while everyone else gets snow so I hope you get to visit! ;)

Yeah I hope I get to visit as well. I've heard great things about Phoenix. 

Great to hear the meetup and campus were awesome!
